chargeback: Check duplicates and merchant name variants.
Start dispute/chargeback workflow and explain timeline.
lost_or_stolen_card: Confirm identity and freeze the card immediately.
Order replacement card and confirm delivery address.
card_arrival: Verify identity and confirm shipping address.
Check card delivery status and expected arrival date.
If delayed, order a replacement or escalate to logistics.
refund_not_showing_up: Confirm merchant, amount and refund date.
Explain typical refund timelines and next steps.
If overdue, open a case and provide reference ID.
unknown: Ask a clarifying question: "What do you need help with today?"
Confirm identity and gather key details (amount/date/merchant) if relevant.
Route to the appropriate support flow once clarified.
